2025.context: Guidewire Software, Inc. is a software for property and casualty insurers focused on core insurance systems, data analytics, and digital engagement. P&C insurance platform leader. Competing with Duck Creek, Majesco.

competitors.name: BriteCore
competitors.notes: Cloud-native core insurance platform for P&C insurers. Best overall Guidewire alternative according to G2 2025. Unlocks business growth and delivers modern customer experience with all-in-one core system for policies, billing, claims, and product configuration.

competitors.name: EZLynx
competitors.notes: Top Guidewire alternative with built-in tools for rating, policy management, automation, AI-powered insights, retention, and customer self-service. Trusted by agencies nationwide for over 20 years.

competitors.name: Duck Creek
competitors.notes: Major competitor using 'buy what you need, subscribe to the rest later' model. Wide range of insurance operations capabilities. Includes Duck Creek Policy as key product.

competitors.name: AMS360
competitors.notes: Market share leader in insurance administration and management category with 6.44% market share, ahead of Guidewire's 4.58%.

competitors.name: Guidewire PolicyCenter
competitors.notes: Separate Guidewire product competing in same space with 4.08% market share.

competitors.name: Applied Epic
competitors.notes: Major competitor with 4.04% market share in insurance administration category.

competitors.name: Openkoda
competitors.notes: Open-source alternative positioned as 'own-the-code' option. Includes modules for policy management, claims processing, and embedded insurance. Built on Java-based open-source technology stack.

competitors.name: Origami Risk
competitors.notes: Alternative to Guidewire InsuranceSuite for insurance administration.

competitors.name: Verity
competitors.notes: Easy-to-use and cost-effective alternative for small businesses with affordable pricing and simple setup.

competitors.name: InsureEdge
competitors.notes: Small business focused alternative with essential features tailored for growing teams.

competitors.name: GO-INSUR
competitors.notes: Alternative targeting small to mid-sized insurers with affordable pricing.

competitors.name: NowCerts
competitors.notes: Insurance management platform for agencies and small businesses.

competitors.name: Jenesis Software
competitors.notes: Alternative for smaller insurance operations.

competitors.name: Nexsure Insurance Platform
competitors.notes: Platform for insurance agencies and small carriers.

mentionedBy.name: Guidewire Software Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Separate Guidewire product competing in same space with 4.08% market share.
